story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_0200_:
You tried to ruin the peace ceremony’s 
commemorative play, of all things?
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_0300_:
You even gave me information about it
beforehand! What’s your motive?
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_0500_: Our boss never gave orders to cause that fuss.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_0600_:
Some of our team members decided to go rogue
and caused a ruckus.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_0700_:
We’ve recently noticed some troublemakers in
our organization...
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_0800_:
I wanted you to arrest those traitors so we can
find out who they are and what their motives
might be.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_0900_: You wanted to use me and the International Police?
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1000_:
If we were to internally investigate who the
traitors are, people would start to doubt each
other within the organization, right?
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1100_:
If you apprehend the traitors, you get the credit
and the troublemakers are eliminated
from our organization. That’s reasonable, right?
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1300_:
OK then, I have another piece of information that
might fire up your flames of justice.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1400_:
We know that these traitors are trying to
get hold of a secret destructive weapon
in Team Flare’s possession.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1500_: They’re trying to steal it—and the blueprints, too.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1700_: We don’t know what they plan to do with it.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1800_: How could you own such a thing?!
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_1900_:
It’s like insurance for us, in case
something happens.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_2000_:
This way we can always carry out our
boss’s wishes.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_2200_:
I have no intention of ignoring any danger that
could happen on Pasio.
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_2300_:
But I also don’t plan to help you resolve your
own mess!
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_2400_: I will do my own investigation...
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_2600_:
Wh-who are these people? They’re wearing
red sunglasses!
story_teamflare_01_06000/2401_1001_2700_: Red sunglasses? They must be Team Flare!
